instruction: Explain the significance of the weight of firms in the Leaders approach on the broader market.
output: According to the article, the weight of firms in the Leaders approach has increased from 25% in 2017 to just under 40% today, as represented by the MSCI ACWI IMI Index. This change has occurred over only five years and could signal a trend where established firms continue to lose share to those that are better aligned with long-term trends. Thematic investing can help identify these disruptors, whether they are upstarts or rejuvenated incumbents, and complement traditional growth investing.
